Episodes

We are currently in production for Season 1.

Listen to our Season 1 Trailer below and check back every Thursday beginning January 13, 2022 for Season 1 Episodes.

Schedule of Upcoming Podcasts

New podcast released every Thursday, beginning January 13, 2022.

• January 13, 2022: Episode 1 - Scott Murphy, “Buxtehude Beats Bach? Qualifying a Canonic Claim”
• January 20, 2022: Episode 2 - Joe Straus, “Old Age and Music: Old Age as Culture” (1/5)
• January 27, 2022: Episode 3 - John Baxter, “The Teardrop Chord: Analyzing the Enigmatic Minor IV Chord in Pop and Film Music”
• February 3, 2022: Episode 4 - Joe Straus, “Old Age and Music: Old Age + Opera” (2/5)
• February 10, 2022: Episode 5 - Matt Ferrandino, “Sonic Identity, Imitation, and Critical Listening in Popular Music”
• February 17, 2022: Episode 6 - Elizabeth Newton & Franklin Bruno, “The Inside of the Tune: Analyzing the Bridge in Pop”
• February 24, 2022: Episode 7 - Chris Doll, “Is Key Real?”
• March 3, 2022: Episode 8 - Joe Straus, “Old Age and Music: Old Composers” (3/5)
• March 10, 2022: Episode 9 - Nate Mitchell, Sarah A. Gilbert, Timothy Byron, & Justice Srisuk, “Facilitating Musical Discussions on Reddit: An Interdisciplinary Conversation"
• March 17, 2022: Episode 10 - Lucia Pasini, “Women composers in fin-de-siècle Paris: Augusta Holmès, Cécile Chaminade, and Jane Vieu”
• March 24, 2022: Episode 11 - Tyler Howie & Matt Chiu, “Untangling and Complicating Generic Boundaries in Post(-Millenial) Punk”
• March 31, 2022: Episode 12 - Nicholas Hunter, “Dialogic and Tropological Processes in Lili Boulanger’s Faust et Hélène”
• April 7, 2022: Episode 13 - Joe Straus, “Old Age and Music: Old Performers” (4/5)
• April 14, 2022: Episode 14 - Kim Soby with Elizabeth Austin, “Misogyny in 19th Century Lieder”
• April 21, 2022: Episode 15 - Landon Morrison, “Making Orchestras Speak/Making Computers Listen”
• April 28, 2022: Episode 16 - Jennifer Campbell, “Journeys Through Middleground: Holding Space Between Academic Analysis and YouTube Entertainment”
• May 5, 2022: Episode 17 - Joe Straus, “Old Age and Music: Old Listeners” (5/5)
